<h1 style="text-align: center;">
  NetFlix Like
</h1>

Create A NetFlix like application using React, Styled-Components and FireBase.
The design pattern used is Compound Components.

This project has been made thanks to a Youtube tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_EEwGe-a9o&ab_channel=KarlHadwen
